abstracts.cdata!:
The project, which would assist the
            Government of Mauritius in creating productive employment in
            rural areas, includes the following components: rural
            village improvement, bench terracing, afforestation, fodder
            planting, technical and consultant services, and training.
            The project is designed and located in such a way as to
            benefit the poorest segments of the rural population.
